Component Requirements
======================

This document defines the functional and safety requirements.

Functional Requirements
------------------------

REQ-FUNC-001
~~~~~~~~~~~~

The system shall process input data within 100ms.

REQ-FUNC-002
~~~~~~~~~~~~

The system shall provide output with 99.9% accuracy.

Safety Requirements
-------------------

REQ-SAFE-001
~~~~~~~~~~~~

The system shall detect and handle fault conditions within 50ms.

REQ-SAFE-002
~~~~~~~~~~~~

The system shall maintain safe state during power loss.
